main event: Robert P. Herrabrugh observed a fiery, round object moving in a parabolic course near Zanderij Airport.
interesting points: The observation took place on November 3, 1962, around 5:30 p.m.,The object was initially mistaken for a star before its movement was noted,The observation was made through binoculars,The source of the report is Dutch Military,The object was thought to possibly be a satellite but could not be identified.
witness description: Robert P. Herrabrugh, who observed the object through binoculars
